attributes.action: urge the BBC not to cut 6Music radio station.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The UK is famous as a world leader in popular music and for 40 years the BBC has played a major role in fostering and promoting new talent. 6Music plays a major part of this and there is no other station - commercial or state funded - with a comparable output. Furthermore it provides a musical education by playing older music from all sorts of genres that are not otherwise played.  In doing so it enriches the cultural life of the nation.
 
In short 6Music does what the BBC ought to do: it provides a public service.
The cost savings would be paltry compared to the overall cost of the BBC.
Please do not allow the BBC to cut this station.

rejection.details: The BBC is independent of government and so this is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
